name: ClientPlayerEntityHelper
description: A specialized wrapper for the client-side player entity in JSMacros, providing access to player-specific functionality, movement controls, interaction methods, and client-side operations.
overview: The ClientPlayerEntityHelper class is a specialized wrapper for the client-side player entity in JSMacros, providing access to player-specific functionality, movement controls, interaction methods, and client-side operations. This class extends PlayerEntityHelper and inherits all player and living entity methods while adding client-specific functionality like camera control, movement manipulation, and client-side interactions. This class is typically obtained through the Player.getPlayer() method and represents the local client player.

constructors.description: Obtains the instance of ClientPlayerEntityHelper for the local client player. This is a static factory method on the Player class.

methods.name: setPos
methods.signature: setPos(double x, double y, double z, boolean await)
methods.description: Sets the player's position to the specified coordinates. This executes on the main thread.

parameters.name: await
parameters.description: Whether to wait for the operation to complete (added in 1.9.0)

methods.name: lookAt
methods.signature: lookAt(double x, double y, double z)
methods.description: Makes the player look at the specified coordinates.
examples:
// Look at target first
player.lookAt(x, y + player.getEyeHeight(), z);

methods.name: calculateMiningSpeed
methods.description: Calculates the time in ticks required to mine a specific block with a specific item.

methods.name: getAttackCooldownProgress
methods.description: Gets the current attack cooldown progress (0.0 to 1.0).

methods.name: getAttackCooldownProgressPerTick
methods.description: Gets the amount the attack cooldown increases per tick.

methods.name: getItemCooldownsRemainingTicks
methods.description: Gets the remaining cooldown ticks for items currently on cooldown.

methods.name: getFoodLevel
methods.description: Gets the player's current food level (0-20).

methods.name: getSaturation
methods.description: Gets the player's current saturation level.

methods.name: getPlayerName
methods.description: Gets the player's actual name (not display name).

methods.name: getAbilities
methods.description: Gets the player's abilities (gamemode, flying status, etc.).

methods.name: getXP
methods.description: Gets the total experience points of the player.

methods.name: getXPLevel
methods.description: Gets the current experience level of the player.

methods.name: getHealth
methods.description: Gets the current health of the player.

methods.name: getMaxHealth
methods.description: Gets the maximum health of the player.

methods.name: getMainHand
methods.description: Gets the item stack currently held in the main hand.

methods.name: getOffHand
methods.description: Gets the item stack currently held in the off hand.

methods.name: isSleepingLongEnough
methods.description: Checks if the player has been sleeping long enough to skip the night.

methods.name: getFishingBobber
methods.description: Gets the fishing bobber entity if the player is currently fishing.
